title.rendered: Pawan Hans Limited in  Uttar Pradesh, India

content.rendered:
Pawan Hans Limited is a helicopter service company based in New Delhi, India. Pawan Hans is a Mini Ratna-I category PSU. It has cumulatively flown more than 1 million hours and has had 2.5 million landings on its fleet since its formation. The operations are based at the Juhu Aerodrome in Vile Parle (West), Mumbai.  It was founded in 1985.

Pawan Hans Limited Address, Phone, Email, Working hours

Address: C-14, Sector-1,
Noida-201301,
Distt. Gautam Budh Nagar,
Uttar Pradesh,
INDIA

Phone: +91 0120-2476700

Fax: +91 120-24769838

Email: contact@pawanhans.co.in

Map: View Direction 

Pawan Hans Limited Official website: www.pawanhans.co.in

Pawan Hans Limited Baggage Allowance

View Pawan Hans Limited Hand | Cabin baggage, Checked baggage, Excess baggage charges, over weight baggage charges, over size baggage charges in the above link.

Types of Planes / Air craft available with Pawan Hans Limited 

Fleet size: 43

  • Dauphin SA-365N
  • Dauphin AS365N3
  • Bell 206 L4
  • Bell 407
  • Mil Mi-172
  • AS 350 B3

Queries handled by Pawan Hans Limited Customer care:

Schedule, eBooking, Rescheduling, Track and Trace, Charter Service Queries, Trucking service Queries, e-claims Flight Information, Missing Luggage, Delayed Flights. Pharma, pets, valuable, perishable goods and extra care shipment queries.

Is there any problem / complaint with reaching the Pawan Hans Limited Address or Phone number? Please report any issues using the below comment form.

Rate your experience with the Pawan Hans Limited: (click on the stars below)
